mapper.insert:
insert into b_rp_promo_details ( id, hotelId, billId, orderId, checkinTime, checkoutTime, beginTime, endTime, orderTime, orderType, promoType, dayNumber, roomTypeName, roomTypeId, roomNo, roomId, payMethod, financeStatus, orderPrice, availableMoney, mikePrice, lezhuCoins, onlinePaied, aliPaied, wechatPaied, billCost, changeCost, finalCost, income, createTime ) values
( #{detail.id}, #{detail.hotelId}, #{detail.billId}, #{detail.orderId}, #{detail.orderId},
#{item.hotelId}, #{item.beginTime}, #{item.endTime}, #{item.orderId}, #{item.onlinePaied}, #{item.aliPaied}, #{item.wechatPaied}, #{item.billCost}, #{item.changeCost}, #{item.finalCost}, #{item.income}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.financeStatus}, #{item.availableMoney} )
mapper.select: select id, promoType, hotelId, beginTime, endTime, orderId, onlinePaied, aliPaied, wechatPaied, billCost, changeCost, finalCost, income, createTime, financeStatus, availableMoney from b_bill_special_day t where t.id = #{id}
